activities: As a cloud service provider, certain personal information is received to establish, invoice, support and provision customers and accounts and hire and manage a global workforce.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland
personaldata: Manually and automatic processed personal contact information company name, address, phone number, email address, financial qualification and billing information, like billing name and address, credit card #, and employee #, personnel and HR information; and additional information, such as company annual revenues, number of employees, or industry.
